review: I love the fire tv platform. I decided to upgrade to the beefier Full fledged model after using a stick for the enhanced responsiveness. In general I haven't been disappointed. though i think my remote is having issues maybe because it often detects the stick and briefly gets confused as to which it is paired with I'm not sure. the only other issues in my experience are: 1. lack of cross provider support ( competition doesn't like playing nicely with amazon Or Amazon doesn't want to play with them. i could expound but others already have and i did in my fire tv stick review which is more involved)2. Lack of custom shortcuts readily accessible from the homescreen. I bought an app to help with this and give access to side-loaded apps but i wish the default home option had a FAVs section right by recent and that either that or recent was the first thing selected After hitting Home ( currently its some suggested content add). Overall worth it but I'd like Amazon to scale back the suggested content as I usually want to get to the same apps all the time and rarely want to pursue what is suggested on home. Suggest when selecting video or apps but not always at the home screen. If you keep it at least make it a sub portion of the screen instead of the first thing you can select and having it take up the majority of the  screen.
